pr_title: CAMEL-15409: ArangoDb - add operations on graphs in the producer

timeline.bodyText: I think this will be updated after the release
timeline.author: oscerd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
     "title": "ArangoDb",
     "description": "Perform operations on ArangoDb documents, collections and graphs.",
     "deprecated": false,
-    "firstVersion": "3.5.0-SNAPSHOT",
+    "firstVersion": "3.5.0",

replies.bodyText:
So do I drop that change?
Manually I did the change only on the endpoint class. Then with mvn install it changes the first version everywhere.
I noticed it's the only one with snapshot in first version
replies.author: zbendhiba
